summary: Liv is a mercenary drawn into a mission to rescue a kidnapped politician. He travels to the volatile Mideast and is assisted by Laura, a translator, where their lives are imperiled.
cast: Diana Sands|Calvin Lockhart|Seth Allen|J. Eric Bell|Brian Phelan|Bricktop|Thomas Baptiste|Gay Suilin|Nabih Aboul Hoson|Mr. Sunshine|G. Smokey Campbell|B.T. Taylor
title: Muerte al Primer Ministro
